import React, { useContext, useState } from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import { AuthContext } from "../../Contexts/UserContext"; import { ToggleMode } from "../../layouts/Main"; const Navbar = () => { const [navbar, setNavbar] = useState(false); const {toggle, setToggle} = useContext(ToggleMode); const { user, logOut } = useContext(AuthContext); const handleSignOut = () => { logOut() .then(() => {}) .catch((error) => console.error(error)); }; return (
    {menuItems}
Trusted Furniture
    {menuItems}
); }; export default Navbar;
